validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `IndividualFacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

```

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"offers": {
  "@type": "Offer",
  "identifier": "OX-AD",
  "name": "Adult",
  "price": 7.5,

}
```

Recommended property `name` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```

Recommended property `ageRestriction` is missing from `Offer`.

A full example looks like this:

```

  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 15,
  "maxValue": 60

```

config.testName: Single named leased space is unavailable for purchase by other users
config.testDescription: For an opportunity with 1 spaces: Check the opportunity has 1 space in the feed. Run C1 and C2 to book one item (creating an named lease) - during this run call C2 twice, and check that both times there are still 1 remaining space from this UUID's perspective. Check the opportunity has 0 space in the feed. Run C1 and C2 again for a new Order UUID for the same opportunity attempting to book 1 space, expecting OrderItems to be returned having an OpportunityCapacityIsReservedByLeaseError.

description: For an opportunity with 1 spaces: Check the opportunity has 1 space in the feed. Run C1 and C2 to book one item (creating an named lease) - during this run call C2 twice, and check that both times there are still 1 remaining space from this UUID's perspective.
